entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Morrisburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:55 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening then east 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or ice pellets. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to freezing rain in the morning then to periods of rain in the afternoon. Ice pellet amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening and after midnight. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 40%
